item.title: Introduction to Deep Learning-Coding Preparation-
item.description: # Target audience It is a continuation of Last article. This article prepares for coding from now on. If you want to implement it yourself, but it is quite … please take a look. (Basically, I can’t use complicated techniques, so don’t worry.) ** The coding environment is jupyter notebook. ** If you want to manage it at the module level elsewhere, uncomment the command such as import. If it doesn’t work please let me know in the comments… Next article here

item.title: Introduction to Python for non-engineers
item.description: ## Following the trend of the world ~ About programming ~ Recently, “programming” has come to the forefront without even saying. Until a while ago (2010-2015), programming was something that engineers in the science field worked on, and it was unfamiliar to so-called non-mathematical people, such as those used by PC experts. However, if you look around the world, IT companies such as GAFA are listed in Top 10 in the world market capitalization ranking.
